title: fried gnocchi with broccoli pesto and grilled veg
description: Fast and tasty green veg - griddled for that smoky taste. The ready-made gnocchi are fried for extra crunch and served with a homemade chilli broccolli pesto.
ingredients: 100ml/3½fl oz olive oil, plus extra to loosen if desired
50g/1¾oz parmesan cheese (or vegetarian alternative), freshly grated
300g/10½oz green vegetables such as asparagus, purple sprouting broccoli, courgettes and baby leeks
olive oil, for drizzling and frying
3 slices pancetta, baked or grilled, to garnish (optional)
